name: FirefighterMan
description:
Story

There was an experiment to help firefighters reach to the places they couldn't before, it went wrong and now you and the objects you touch is no longer affected by gravity.

How to play

Left click propels you forward, right click does the opposite. Try to balance your movement to move around the city.

You right click to extinguish flames in front of you which propels you backwards so you have to balance yourself while trying to put out the flames

Objective

Keep the fires in the city under control, you have limited amount of time to extinguish fires and if you let the fires reach to 5 different locations you lose.
